description: Led development of a real-time synthetic vision system for aircraft, delivering game-style 3D situational awareness on low-power hardware for low-visibility flight conditions; secured $1.2M in funding to advance toward production and certification.
Built core backend systems for an AI companion, including a long-term memory module that improved response relevance and contextual continuity across conversations.
Worked on applied machine learning pipelines, improving model performance through data quality analysis and outlier detection in real-world enterprise datasets.
Developed frontend features for a market analytics platform, collaborating with product and backend teams to ship data-driven dashboards and internal tooling.
